SEARCH
Module com.ekidroske.kidroske_elise_lms
Package application

Class LibraryCore

java.lang.Object
application.LibraryCore
public class LibraryCore extends Object
Represents the application layer of the library management system. Processes and validates data from external files and passes them on for use. Handles exchanges of information between the controller and database layers. Enforces business logic.

  • Field Summary
